Tip.1: Determine your income and expenses to see where your money goes. This will help you identify inefficient spending and save money.
Tip.2: Try to set aside 3-6 months of expenses for emergencies such as job loss or serious medical expenses.
Tip.3: Before making financial decisions (like opening an account or taking out a mortgage), compare different options and choose the most favorable ones.
